FB1852), operating from: Room B, 5/F, Bonham Majoris, 40 Bonham Strand, Sheung Wan. By listing General Insurance products available in the market on our website, we help customers search and compare suitable General Insurance products to meet their needs.
MSHKF is not an insurance company and does not underwrite any insurance risk, nor does it represent any insurance company. MSHKF does not charge customers for its services; MSHKF receives fees/ commissions from insurance companies as remuneration for its services. Your continued browsing or use of the site constitutes your acceptance to such arrangement.
To continue browsing and using the website, please confirm you have read and understood Service Agreement of MSHKF and agree to be bound by it.

This information may be different than what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider or specific product’s site. For any discrepancy in product information, please refer to the financial institution’s website for the most updated version. All financial products and services are presented without warranty. Additionally, this site may be compensated through third party advertisers. However, the results of our comparison tools which are not marked as sponsored are always based on objective analysis first.
Best Generali Travel Insurance
Different Generali travel insurance plans have different amount for various coverage items, please see the maximum coverage amount for each compensation item below:
Generali Travel Insurance Coverage Standard Plan Classic Plan Premier Plan
Medical Expenses HK$500,000 HK$1,000,000 HK$1,500,000
Overseas Hospital Cash HK$2,500 HK$5,000 HK$8,000
Compassionate Visit HK$10,000 HK$15,000 HK$20,000
Trip Cancellation HK$10,000 HK$20,000 HK$40,000
Trip Curtailment or Re-arrangement HK$10,000 HK$20,000 HK$40,000
Loss of pre-paid transportation and accommodation expenses due to cancellation of trip HK$1,000 HK$1,500 HK$2,000
Personal Baggage HK$10,000 HK$15,000 HK$20,000
Personal Money HK$2,000 HK$2,500 HK$3,000
Credit Card Protection HK$20,000 HK$30,000 HK$50,000
Loss of Home Content HK$5,000 HK$10,000 HK$15,000
Generali Travel Insurance Key Features
General is characterized by an extensive coverage and its key features are as follows:
No deductibles
Some travel insurance products on the market require insurers to bear some costs before claiming. But Generali travel insurance products do not require any deductibles.
Leisure sports are covered
Insurers are covered for participating in leisure sports including skiing, scuba diving, bungee jumping, etc. while traveling - giving you peace of mind while having fun.
Cover follow-up medical expenses after returning to Hong Kong
Cover Chinese treatment, bone setting and acupuncture overseas medical expense and follow-up medical expense within 3 months after your return- which is not always covered in other travel insurance products so insurers can focus on recovery.
Mobile phone loss/damage is covered
Not all travel insurance is covered for mobile phone loss/ damage. But Generali travel insurance products covered such loss up to HK$2,500 per item.
Extends automatically for 10 days
The cover of Single Trip Travel Plan extends automatically for a maximum of 10 days if the trip is unavoidably delayed.
How do I make a claim?
You must file a claim within 30 days of the incident. This can be done by completing the claim form and submitting the supporting documents via Generali App Bravo, email or by post.
Via Generali App Bravo
Insurers must file a claim within 30 days of the incident. This can be done by completing the claim form and submitting the supporting documents via Generali App Bravo, email or by post.
Step 1
Download Generali App Bravo via Apple Store or Google Play Store
Step 2
Upload the completed claim form with claim information and upload supporting documents on Bravo
Step 3
Generali will process your application
Step 4
Once approved, Generali will process the claim
By email or post
Step 1
Fill in the claim form with claim information and prepare supporting documents
Step 2
Submit them by email or post when ready
Step 3
Generali will process your application
Step 4
Once approved, Generali will process the claim
FAQ
Does Generali Travel Insurance offer Covid-19 coverage?
Yes, it does.
What are the key features of Generali Travel Insurance?
Generali Travel Insurance has extensive coverage, covering leisure sports, electronic devices and personal belongings, as well as Covid-19 related medical expenses.
If I study abroad, am I eligible to purchase Generali Travel Insurance?
Not recommended - since it only covers up to 182 for single trip travel insurance and 120 days for annual cover, it doesn’t cover the entire academic year. Students are advised to buy insurance dedicated for studying abroad for more protection.
